title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch

A simple, tough watch that’s easy to read and easy to use. It charges itself in sunlight, so you worry less about batteries and more about enjoying your day.

Why you’ll like it:
- No-fuss charging: The watch can recharge from the sun. With a few hours of bright daylight most days, the battery can last a very long time in regular watch mode.
- Clear, strong build: Scratch‑resistant glass and a sturdy case. Water‑proof to 100 meters, so showers, swims, and waves are no problem.
- Big, simple information: Large, high‑contrast screen shows time, heart rate, steps, and more at a glance.
- Comfortable size: 45 mm case that’s light and easy to wear all day.

Helpful for staying active and safe:
- Heart and health checks: Monitors heart rate, sleep, breathing, stress, and blood oxygen levels (availability may vary).
- Easy activity tracking: Preloaded profiles for walking/running, biking, swimming, and strength training. Just start and go.
- Smart alerts: Get gentle notifications from your phone on your wrist, so you don’t miss calls or messages.

Great for the water:
- Surf features: Counts your waves and shows speed, distance, and local tide info.
- Windsurfing and kiteboarding: Tracks your position, speed, distance, heart rate, and jump height.
- Works with Surfline Sessions to review your rides later.

Reliable navigation outdoors:
- Built‑in compass and barometer to help with direction and weather changes.
- Uses multiple satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo) for accurate location.

What it’s made of:
- Tough case: Fiber‑reinforced polymer for durability.
- Glass: Scratch‑resistant Corning Gorilla Glass.
- Designed to handle heat, cold, shocks, and water.

Good to know:
- Solar works best with bright sunlight (about 3 hours per day). In strong sun, GPS tracking can last up to 48 hours. In regular watch mode with daily sun, battery life can feel “unlimited.”
- Supports Connect IQ for simple watch face and app options.
- Garmin Pay may not be available on all versions; check your model.

In short: This is a sturdy, easy‑to‑read watch that looks after your health, helps you stay active, and keeps going with the power of the sun. Put it on, step outside, and let it do the hard work for you.
